name: Orchestrator
description: dVIX Orchestrator. Orchestrator contract in charge of managing the settings of the vaults, rewards and dVIX token. It acts as the owner of these contracts.

eventDecorators.name: GuardianSet
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when the guardian is updated.

eventDecorators.name: TransactionExecuted
eventDecorators.description: An event emitted when a transaction is executed.

functionDecorators.name: addDVIXVault
functionDecorators.description: Adds Vault to DVIX ERC20. Only owner can call itValidates if _dvix is validValidates if _vault is valid.

functionDecorators.name: enableDVIXCap
functionDecorators.description: Enables or disables the dVIX Cap. Only owner can call itValidates if _dvix is valid.

functionDecorators.name: executeTransaction
functionDecorators.description: Allows the owner to execute custom transactions. Only owner can call it.

functionDecorators.name: guardian
functionDecorators.description: Address that can set to 0 the fees or pause the vaults in an emergency event.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: pauseVault
functionDecorators.description: Pauses the Vault. Only guardian can call itValidates if _vault is valid.

functionDecorators.name: removeDVIXVault
functionDecorators.description: Removes Vault to DVIX ERC20. Only owner can call itValidates if _dvix is validValidates if _vault is valid.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: retrieveAVAX
functionDecorators.description: Retrieves the AVAX stuck on the orchestrator. Only owner can call it.

functionDecorators.name: setBurnFee
functionDecorators.description: Sets the burn fee of a vault. Only owner can call it.

functionDecorators.name: setDVIXCap
functionDecorators.description: Sets the dVIX maximum minting value. Only owner can call itValidates if _dvix is valid.

functionDecorators.name: setEmergencyBurnFee
functionDecorators.description: Sets the burn fee to 0, only used on a black swan event. Only guardian can call itValidates if _vault is valid.

functionDecorators.name: setEmergencyLiquidationPenalty
functionDecorators.description: Sets the liquidation penalty of a vault to 0, only used on a black swan event. Only guardian can call itValidates if _vault is valid.

functionDecorators.name: setGuardian
functionDecorators.description: Sets the guardian of the orchestrator. Only owner can call it.

functionDecorators.name: setLiquidationPenalty
functionDecorators.description: Sets the liquidation penalty of a vault. Only owner can call it.

functionDecorators.name: setRatio
functionDecorators.description: Sets the ratio of a vault. Only owner can call it.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: unpauseVault
functionDecorators.description: Unpauses the Vault. Only guardian can call itValidates if _vault is valid.
